thread.title: $7.3M verdict against Lady Gaga's former boyfriend tossed
thread.title_full: $7.3M verdict against Lady Gaga's former boyfriend tossed

title: $7.3M verdict against Lady Gaga's former boyfriend tossed
text: > Entertainment $7.3M verdict against Lady Gaga's former boyfriend tossed FILE - In this Sept. 20, 2015 file photo, Lady Gaga arrives at the 67th Primetime Emmy Awards at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. Lady Gaga’s first producer and former boyfriend has been given a new trial after a judge overturned an order that he pay $7.3 million to the Hollywood songwriter who discovered her. U.S. District Court Judge Jose Linares ordered the new trial for Rob Fusari on Sept. 3, but the ruling wasn’t unsealed until Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2015. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP)
